metadata.name: EyeOfRainbow.eth
metadata.description:
I started painting “Eye of Rainbow” in July ‘21 and finished by October for an exhibition. It was curated with the motto “WE = ALL OF US” and was fundraising for LGBTI+ individuals in need. 

Now it has transformed into its digital form for a spring-themed NFT exhibition organized by the same kind-hearted person.

While preparing for this exhibition, my mother was diagnosed with cancer and the war broke out. These tough times made me realize how unique and magic is each random breath we take. 

This is how “Breathing Colors” collection was made.

‘EyeOfRainbow.eth’ which we reinterpreted with Osman Can Karacı,
as the first piece of the ‘Breathing Colors’ collection,
emphasizes the value of every breath we take.
💜

Painting: 
“FISPIS” on Canvas
90 cm
2021

Digital Manipulation: Osman Can Karacı 
Loop Animation, 6 sec
1280x1280 px
30 fps
2022
